Room.Name: Right Platform
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing precariously on the right platform, high above the Carnival.
Room.LongDescription: Perched high above the ground, you stand amidst trapeze artists waiting their turn to perform. They make swinging through the air, doing flips and dives, look like children playing on a swing. You would probably not have a problem getting to the main platform if you jumped with some effort and held on tight. A tiny ladder is attached to the post supporting the platform. Directly below, clowns and acrobats perform in the small ring.
